issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
Noticed the issue on a eucalyptus cloud with two clusters - one backed by EMC SAN and the other by Equallogic SAN. Steps for reproducing the volume creation failure on cluster backed by EMC SAN

# Create a 1GB volume in the cluster backed by Equallogic SAN
# Snapshot the volume
# Create a volume from this snapshot in the cluster backed by EMC SAN

Related log snippet from storage controller
{noformat}
2014-12-08 15:11:39  INFO 000003737 SANManager               | Creating backend volume vol-afc4ca81 mapping to vol-afc4ca81 from backend snapshot snap-583c037f mapping to snap-583c037f
2014-12-08 15:11:39 DEBUG 000003737 NaviSecCli               | Navisphere CLI: /opt/Navisphere/bin/naviseccli -User gadmin -Password ****** -Scope 0 -h 10.109.5.1 lun -list -Name vol-afc4ca81
2014-12-08 15:11:40 DEBUG 000003737 NaviSecCli               | Navisphere CLI return: [9]
                          | Could not retrieve the specified (pool lun). The (pool lun) may not exist

fields.summary: EMC volume creation from snapshot fails if snapshot was originally created on Equallogic
